## numberWithMatchingType variable

Takes a numeric term and a plain number, returns number wrapped in typed literal compatible with term.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
numberWithMatchingType: (t: Term<"float" | "int" | "uint" | "vec2" | "vec3" | "vec4">, x: number) => import("../api/nodes").Lit<"float"> | import("../api/nodes").Lit<"int"> | import("../api/nodes").Lit<"uint"> | import("../api/nodes").Lit<"bool">
```
